value:
What a sweet little vacation...this
isn't going to be. We'll just have to
see what happens, I suppose.

There's a beorc in my world who's a
little bit...different. Nice guy. Wonder
if there's anybody like that here.

Forgive me for saying this, but...
Beorc sure do fret over the strangest
things. Why can't they learn to relax?

Is the color of my eyes really so
strange? Don't stare too long. I'll
melt away...

Oh, I'm doing my part. I'm patrolling...
That's it—patrolling. Gotta put these
ears and nose to work, don't I?

My name is Ranulf. I'm here on
behalf of $Nf.
Let's take a little break, hmm?

My senses feel...sharper! That's the
word, right? Sharper.

Oh, yeah...feeling good. Now you're
going to see the fruits of my training!

Uh-oh. Little bit sloppy. Gotta
get myself riled up!

Well, then. Will this bring forth
something bad, or something
good? Let's see...

I am Ranulf, a warrior of Gallia. That
doesn't matter to you, though, does
it? Let's just take it nice and easy.

You are one focused individual,
aren't you? Are you on a mission
of self-improvement or something?$k$pYou look a little tired, if you ask me.
There's a lot of tension stored in
your shoulders. Try to relax...$k$pLook, I know how it is. All the people
here expect the world from you, and
you push yourself way too hard.$k$pThis is a beorc thing, I guess. But no
matter how strong you are, if you
exhaust yourself, that's it.$k$pYou can rely on me sometimes, you
know. Just forget about today's battle
and let me handle it.$k$pThat would be irresponsible? No,
you're completely turned around. If
you drop, what happens then?$k$pWell, I've said my piece for today.
Just give your pal Ranulf a call when
you need him, OK?
せいっ！
よっと！
うああっ！
参ったね…
I'm gonna bring you down.
I'll end this here.
Didn't expect THIS, did you?
Hey, you! Over here!
I'm leaving everything in your hands...
Haha
I'm Ranulf, right hand to Gallia's future king...basically.
What, you've never seen someone with ears like mine?
I'm not like the other laguz. I get myself mixed up in the problems of the beorc.
Oh, sorry. I'm interrupting you.
A tail is a good thing to have! Oh you poor beorc... I can't imagine living without a tail.
Sothe and Ike look so much older now. Beorc grow up so fast...
I want to see you make it to the end. Do it for me! Just kidding.
Here we go.
Back at it.
Let's go, then.
